tweet.text: Secretary Shultz emphasized human rights as a component of U.S. foreign policy. Under his watch, the United States ratified the United Nations’ Genocide Convention, which President Reagan formally signed on November 5, 1988. https://t.co/OX0y764CKQ https://t.co/ERidhvpyAB
tweet.html: Secretary Shultz emphasized human rights as a component of U.S. foreign policy. Under his watch, the United States ratified the United Nations’ Genocide Convention, which President Reagan formally signed on November 5, 1988. history.state.gov/historicaldocu…
